pages.text: Pokhvala musytʹ BOH, khto utvoryv nebo ta zemlyu, ta zroblenu temryavu ta svitlo. Dosi, tsey khto disbelieve u yikhnʹomu Lordi prodovzhuyutʹsya deviate
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto utvoryv vas z hryazyuky, todi predetermined vash dovichnyy promizhok, zhyttya promizhok shcho ye vidomyy tilʹky yomu. Dosi, vy prodovzhuyetesya maty sumniv
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odnoho BOHA u nebi ta zemli. Vin znaye vashi tayemnytsi ta vashi deklaratsiyi, ta Vin znaye vse vy zaroblyayete
Niyaka materiya yakyy riznovyd dokazu ne prybuvaye yim z yikhnʹoho Lorda, vony prohanyayutʹ z tse, u antypatiyi
Z vony vidkhylyly pravdu koly yomu prybuly yim, vony zaznaly naslidkiv yikhnʹoho heedlessness

vony ne pobachyly skilʹky heneratsiy pered tym, yak yim my vynyshchyly? My vstanovyly yikh na zemli bilʹsh nizh my dlya vas, ta my showered yim z blahoslovennyam, velykodushno, ta my yakshcho yim z techuchymy potokamy. My todi vynyshchyly yikh vnaslidok yikhnikh hrikhiv, ta my zaminyly inshu heneratsiyu u yikhnʹomu mistsi
Navitʹ yakshcho b my poslaly vnyz yim fizychnu knyhu, napysanu na paperi, ta vony torknulysya tse z yikhnimy rukamy, tsey khto disbelieved by skazav, "Tse ne ye bilʹsh nizh rozumne zacharuvannya
Vony takozh skazaly, "Yakby tilʹky anhel mih prybuty vnyz z nym!" My poslaly anhel, vsya materiya bula by prypynena, ta vony bilʹshe ne by respited
